document_data.name: Falwan Underbough
document_data.mainbody: '''Falwan Underbough''' was a community leader in [[Cormanthor]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/The Occupation of Szith Morcane|8-9}}
document_data.History:
Falwan was a famous baker in [[Hillsfar]], known among nobility for his "half cakes" until the reintroduction of the [[First Great Law of Humanity]] by [[Torin Nomerthal]] forced Falwan and his family to escape the city. He took refuge in [[Cormanthor]] with many other non-human refugees. In time, they formed a small community and Falwan somehow became their leader and spokesman.

''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], he was afraid of numerous [[drow]] arriving on the surface in the area.
document_data.Personality: Falwan was very proud of his work as a baker and suffered for the loss of his business. He was a friendly individual but experience made him cautious toward armed [[human]]s.{{Cite adventurers league/The Occupation of Szith Morcane|9}}
document_data.Relationship: Falwan had good dealings with [[Elanil Elassidil]] and the leaders of [[Elventree]].
